creator: Vigocare Pvt Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Vigo Clinic is the one stop destination for doctors monitoring their patients using Vigocare monitoring solutions such as Vigo SmartHeart, Vigo Multivital Monitoring etc. It provides for an intuitive interface for doctors to access all the information pertaining to their patients including patient details, real-time vital signs, and parameter trends.

The Vigo Clinic app is built with a host of exciting features to enable doctors to seamlessly assimilate patient information and communicate with their medical staff, thereby assisting the doctors in making appropriate and timely interventions.

Some salient features in the App include:

1. Single Dashboard view for doctors to monitor the real time status of patients
2. Live and historic vitals of patients and trends that can be used to detect clinical deterioration
3. Notifications and alerts regarding patients’ clinical conditions
4. Incoming messages from Nurses to enable timely response
title: Vigo Clinic

title: Vigo Clinic

creator: Vigocare Pvt Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Vigo Konnect is a dedicated application for healthcare professionals (HCPs) and Healthcare administrators availing patient monitoring services with Vigocare. Vigo Konnect provides HCPs and administrators real-time, remote access to vital signs, patient reports and other key parameters of their patients being monitored on the Vigo platform. Designed to make patient monitoring more convenient, Vigo Konnect also allows seamless registration of patients and the medical staff who are involved in providing care to patients. Vigo Konnect can be used in conjunction with Vigo Heart and Vigo Vitals, Vigo’s proprietary monitoring patient solutions used for long-term ECG monitoring and Vitals monitoring respectively.

Key Features:
1. Real-time access to patient vitals and key parameters for clinicians to stay in the know, at all times.
2. Actionable patient insights shared with clinicians to make swift and accurate interventions.
3. One consolidated View encapsulating all patients registered for monitoring with Vigocare
4. Instant report access upon completion of patient monitoring
5. Quick patient registration built-in to seamlessly onboard patients onto Vigo Heart and Vigo Vitals
6. User-based access to manage patient monitoring effectively and efficiently.
7. Admin specific controls to securely manage access to patients and sensitive information

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Ability for all users to change password.
Access to Customer Support's contact information.
Bug fixes and improvements.

title: Vigo Konnect
